title: Requirements Gathering
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements. Ensure a clear, concise, and feasible representation that aligns with the project scope, focusing on both technical and non-technical aspects of the system design.

title: Design the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Create a high-level design for the system architecture and user interfaces

title: Develop the Frontend Interface for NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Design and develop a user-friendly, responsive, and intuitive interface for controlling and interacting with the NeuralCreativityAmplifier system. The interface should allow users to adjust settings, monitor progress, receive real-time feedback on their creative output, and provide an seamless user experience across various devices. This includes: 1. Designing wireframes and prototypes for user interaction and feedback mechanisms. 2. Implementing a reusable component architecture. 3. Optimizing the frontend for performance and accessibility. 4. Ensuring the design adheres to established style guidelines and brand identity. 5. Integrating API calls as necessary for data retrieval and control.

title: Implement the Backend Logic - RFC Update
description: Update: This task involves developing the server-side logic for processing and responding to user inputs. This includes data handling, model integration (specify machine learning models), response generation, error handling, and performance optimization.

title: Integrate Database Functionality
description: Design and implement a robust, scalable, secure, and easy to query database schema for efficient storage of user data, system logs, and machine learning models relevant to the NeuralCreativityAmplifier. Due to the expected high volume of data and real-time requirements, the design should align with the principles of NoSQL databases. Consider data partitioning, indexing strategies, and data compression techniques for efficient storage and retrieval.

title: Test the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Execute functional and performance tests on the system to ensure correctness and efficiency. This includes testing the entire system from frontend interface, backend logic, to database functionality. Additionally, suggest improvements for potential issues found during testing. Upon completion of testing, provide a comprehensive report detailing the results and recommendations.

title: Deploy the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Prepare and execute deployment procedures for production environment. Please ensure all necessary tests have been conducted prior to this step, including safety and ethical considerations. The system should be deployed in a staging environment before moving to production. Additionally, the documentation related to the deployment process should be updated and made available to the team.

title: Review and Approve Design Documents
description: Review design documents for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project requirements

title: Review and Approve Requirements Document
description: Review requirements document for accuracy, completeness, and feasibility
